strings:
<voice_0x01000F46><se_low>*: Prince Charmles!
Please show us the Argon heart you obtained.
<voice_0x01000F48><se_high>*: I've never seen such a big Argon heart before!

<voice_0x01000F49><se_high>*: It must be the biggest in the history of
the initiation!
<voice_0x01000F4A><se_def>*: He must have slain quite an Argon lizard to get a heart of that size.

<voice_0x01000F4B><se_low>*: Prince Charmles! Present the Argon heart, symbol of your bravery and worthiness,
to King Clavius!
<voice_0x01000F4D><se_low>King Clavius: Charmles. Do you swear before the Almighty Goddess that you obtained this Argon heart from an Argon lizard slain by your own hand?
<voice_0x01000F4F><se_low>King Clavius: Because, even if, for example, you were assisted by others in battle, I would still recognise your claim to the throne.

<voice_0x01000F50><se_low>King Clavius: But if you obtained it by any other means,
I could not recognise your right to the throne.
Is that perfectly clear?
<voice_0x01000F51><se_def>Prince Charmles: Uh... Yes! Of course! I fought the lizard with my own hands. And a frightful beast it was too!
<voice_0x01000F52><se_low>King Clavius: Very well. Then I congratulate you. I accept this Argon heart as proof of your true character.
